org.drip.state.estimator

Class SmoothingCurveStretchParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.state.estimator.SmoothingCurveStretchParams
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalControlCurveParams, LocalControlCurveParams

    public abstract class SmoothingCurveStretchParams
extends java.lang.Object
    SmoothingCurveStretchParams contains the Parameters needed to hold the Stretch. It provides functionality to: - The Stretch Best fit Response and the corresponding Quote Sensitivity - The Calibration Detail and the Curve Smoothening Quantification Metric - The Segment Builder Parameters
